data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the state of Esfahan prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Esfahan, Iran
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Esfahan.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.section_summary: On average, 10 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Esfahan, Iran.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Esfahan, Iran.
Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Esfahan to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Jew, Judeo-Persian people might believe through him.
Father, you desire the people in the state of Esfahan who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Esfahan, Iran.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 5,094,222 lost in Esfahan that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light
